item.title: By: eibhinn
item.dc:creator: eibhinn
item.description: Thanks so much for an awesome post! This is a great tutorial. A quick thought: in my experience `read` is more widely used and is friendlier than `sysread` (no exceptions) -- is there a reason you’re choosing `sysread` for general cases? Would be interested to know. In any case, thanks again for the excellent resource!
